value.latex:
Montrer que
$$\forall x\in\R,\qquad |\sin x| \leq  |x|,$$
$$\forall x\in[0,\frac \pi 2], \qquad 1-\cos x \leq  x \sin x,$$
$$\forall x\in[-1,1],\qquad 
|\arcsin x| \leq  \left| \frac x{\sqrt{1-x^2}} \right|.$$
value.html: Montrer que \[\forall x\in\R,\qquad |\sin x| \leq |x|,\] \[\forall x\in[0,\frac \pi 2], \qquad 1-\cos x \leq x \sin x,\] \[\forall x\in[-1,1],\qquad |\arcsin x| \leq \left| \frac x{\sqrt{1-x^2}} \right|.\]
